# VNRecognizedText

**Class**

Text recognized in an image through a text recognition request.

## Declaration

```swift
class VNRecognizedText
```

## Overview

A single [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNRecognizedTextObservation] can contain multiple recognized text objects—one for each candidate.

## Determining Recognized Text

- **string**: The top candidate for recognized text.
- **confidence**: A normalized confidence score for the text recognition result.

## Locating Recognized Text

- **boundingBox(for:)**: Calculates the bounding box around the characters in the range of a string.

## Obtaining Recognized Text

- **topCandidates(_:)**: Requests the *n* top candidates for a recognized text string.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- VNRequestRevisionProviding
